link.script:
{"url":"https://www.mohawk.k12.pa.us","name":"Mohawk Area School District","description":"
The Mission of the Mohawk Area School District, in partnership with families and in cooperation with the community, is to provide our students with a rigorous and comprehensive education in a safe and stimulating environment. Thank you for visiting today!","image":"//static1.squarespace.com/static/5a8ed1c8bff20015d133d5c0/t/5a97653fe2c4830be781df2f/1587561838576/","@context":"http://schema.org","@type":"WebSite"}

Mohawk's Distinguished Alumni Hall of Fame

p.strong: Please see below for continued updates on the school closures and other district communications.
The Mohawk Area School District is announcing the postponement of ALL extracurricular activities effective immediately.
